amendment.description: To establish an Office of the Medicare Beneficiary Advocate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1054 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1054 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S8612, S8681; text: CR S8612) To establish an Office of the Medicare Beneficiary Advocate.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1054 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Feingold.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1054 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
